long_description: The Sherpani Milli satchel helps you navigate adventurous travels or just your daily life by keeping all your necessities organized and easily accessible from various pockets. Zippered main compartment features floral nylon lining; exterior flap stays put with a magnetic closure and has a small zip accessory pocket. Features a handy cell phone pocket underneath the flap and an exterior stretch-mesh side pocket. Interior features mesh organization pockets and zip security pocket; includes a detachable change purse with ID window and a key loop. Long adjustable strap crosses over body for secure, hands-free toting. Partially recycled polyester stands up to abrasions, tears and punctures; dyes are nontoxic. Closeout.
short_description: The Sherpani Milli satchel helps you navigate adventurous travels or just your daily life by keeping all your necessities organized and easily accessible from various pockets.
